QuestData.Title: Kung Din
QuestData.Description: I hope you are capable of this next task, for our lives depend on it.$B$BThere is only one key that will unlock our chains. Unfortunately, the key hangs around the neck of the hozen's pet tiger, Kung Din.$B$BThey keep the tiger in the great pit to the north. The only way to retrieve the key will be to kill the beast.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The great beast holds the key.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Slingtail Key by slaying Kung Din.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, with this key I will be able to free our chains.$B$BYou have delivered us from this vile place.
